message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a one-of-a-kind product. I believe it has great value and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $1,200,000.

Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $1,200,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now. I'm willing to pay $1,050,000 for the product. This is a fair price considering the value you've outlined. Let me know what you think.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. I understand that $1,050,000 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'm counteroffering at $1,150,000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's a fair price considering the value of the product.
